mutants.code:
class ListNode:

    def __init__(self, value):
        self.value = value
        self.next = None

def reverse_list_iteratively(head, k):
    prev = None
    curr = head
    next = None
    count = 1
    while curr is not None and count < k:
        next = curr.next
        curr.next = prev
        prev = curr
        curr = next
        count += 1
    if next is not None:
        head.next = reverse_list_iteratively(next, k)
    return prev

    curr = head
    next = None
    count = -1
    while curr is not None and count < k:
        next = curr.next
        curr.next = prev
        prev = curr
        curr = next
        count += 1
    if next is not None:
        head.next = reverse_list_iteratively(next, k)
    return prev
